author: Ivan Tarsis
description: Tab Tango is a streamlined Chrome extension crafted for the ultimate browsing efficiency. Toggle between your most recently used tabs with a simple keyboard shortcut, ensuring a smooth and intuitive navigation experience. Enhanced with a quick tab duplication feature, Tab Tango keeps your workflow fluid and dynamic. Perfect for multitaskers and power users looking to optimize their browser usage without the fuss.
name: Tab Tango
